document.full_text: no offer from world powers can persuade iran to stop enriching uranium, president mahmoud ahmadinejad said on tuesday, dismissing the key demand of countries that fear tehran is developing nuclear weapons.
document.title: iran says no offer can stop it enriching uranium
lines_and_colors: no offer from world powers can persuade iran to stop enriching uranium, president mahmoud ahmadinejad said on tuesday, dismissing the key demand of countries that fear tehran is developing nuclear weapons.
